survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels with subscription-based meal kit delivery services, focusing on factors like variety, convenience, pricing, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based meal kit services?
answer_options: This is my first time using a meal kit service
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based meal kit services?
answer_options: This is my first time using a meal kit service

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize top factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered by your current meal kit service?
answer_options: Not applicable (I don’t currently use a meal kit service)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected any option other than 'This is my first time using a meal kit service' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Include an 'N/A' option for those not currently using a service.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered by your current meal kit service?
answer_options: Not applicable (I don’t currently use a meal kit service)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected any option other than 'This is my first time using a meal kit service' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for subscription-based meal kit services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for subscription-based meal kit services?
